Title: Qur’an Recitation (Nour Al-Bayan Course)
Subtitle: Foundational Arabic Reading & Confident Qur’an Recitation

FAQ.Question: Is this course only for children?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is suitable for both children and adults seeking a strong foundation.

FAQ.Question: Can adults join this course?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. It is designed for anyone needing a solid Arabic reading base.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult in this course?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is learned naturally through repetition and practice.

FAQ.Question: Will I be ready to read the Qur’an confidently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Step-by-step training builds a solid foundation.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, repetition, and clear correction.
